name: zipline
title: Zipline
description: File uploader and URL shortener for Zipline v4
author: maaxgr

commands.name: upload-screenshot
commands.title: Upload File
commands.description: Browse and upload files from a folder to Zipline

commands.name: upload-clipboard
commands.title: Upload from Clipboard
commands.description: Select and upload content from clipboard history

commands.name: upload-clipboard-quick
commands.title: Quick Upload Clipboard
commands.description: Instantly upload current clipboard content (files, images, text, or shorten URLs)

commands.name: shorten-url
commands.title: Shorten URL
commands.description: Create a shortened URL with optional custom alias

commands.name: manage-zipline-files
commands.title: Manage Files
commands.description: View, copy, and delete uploaded files

commands.name: manage-urls
commands.title: Manage Shortened URLs
commands.description: View, copy, and delete shortened URLs

preferences.name: ziplineBaseUrl
preferences.title: Zipline Base URL
preferences.description: The URL of your Zipline instance (e.g., https://zipline.example.com)

preferences.name: ziplineApiToken
preferences.title: Zipline API Token
preferences.description: Your Zipline API token (found in Dashboard → Profile → Copy Token)

preferences.name: defaultFileLocation
preferences.title: Default File Location
preferences.description: The default location where files to upload are located

preferences.name: openBrowserAfterUpload
preferences.title: Open in Browser after Upload
preferences.label: Open in Browser
preferences.description: Open the uploaded file in the browser after the upload is complete

preferences.name: copyLinkToClipboardAfterUpload
preferences.title: Copy Link to Clipboard after Upload
preferences.label: Copy Link
preferences.description: Copy the link to the clipboard after the upload is complete

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
